data.name: Weedle
data.flavorText: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

data.name: Pansage
data.flavorText: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

data.name: Chespin
data.flavorText: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

data.name: Quilladin
data.flavorText: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators' attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

data.name: Chesnaught
data.flavorText: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

data.name: Slugma
data.flavorText: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

data.name: Pansear
data.flavorText: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.

data.name: Fennekin
data.flavorText: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Braixen
data.flavorText: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

data.name: Delphox
data.flavorText: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

data.name: Panpour
data.flavorText: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.

data.name: Froakie
data.flavorText: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

data.name: Frogadier
data.flavorText: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

data.name: Greninja
data.flavorText: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

data.name: Clauncher
data.flavorText: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

data.name: Poochyena
data.flavorText: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

data.name: Mightyena
data.flavorText: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.

data.name: Inkay
data.flavorText: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

data.name: Pawniard
data.flavorText: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

data.name: Bisharp
data.flavorText: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.

data.name: Honedge
data.flavorText: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

data.name: Snubbull
data.flavorText: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.

data.name: Granbull
data.flavorText: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

data.name: Swirlix
data.flavorText: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

data.name: Farfetch'd
data.flavorText: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.

data.name: Snorlax
data.flavorText: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

data.name: Miltank
data.flavorText: If it is around babies, it milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.

data.name: Skitty
data.flavorText: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.

data.name: Bidoof
data.flavorText: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

data.name: Bunnelby
data.flavorText: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

data.name: Fletchling
data.flavorText: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

data.name: Furfrou
data.flavorText: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.

data.name: Furfrou
data.flavorText: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
